name: Manic Mimic
description:
Play as Mimmie the mimic and hoard all the delicious gold and shinnies you can find and become the chest with the best loot in the entire dungeon! Just be careful of the greedy heroes and adventurers who've also come to loot!

Controls

Move with WASD or the Arrow Keys.
Space uses the immobilize ability once unlocked.

Credits

- Chubberdy (Tile Work)

- Darkest Ghoul (Sprite Work)

- Nametaken (Sound Design)

- Xinginmeng (Art Work)

- MaxDigital (Coding)

- Inflation Fan Gamer (Music)

- CrystalCore (Primary Coder)

- BellyBelting (Primary Sprite Work)

GainJam2022 game
